DOC.brief_title: The Effect Picricum Acidum Phosphoricum Acidum Homaccord Perceived Levels Anxiety University Students
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study , conduct two-week period University Johannesburg ( UJ ) Health Clinic , Doornfontein Campus . Thirty university student , age 18 45 year , recruit study mean advertisement place campus relevant permission give . Participants attend initial consultation request sign Participant Information Consent form , complete Participant Information Sheet , Remedy Symptom Questionnaire determine inclusion study . Participants ' vital sign measure . Participants receive 16ml vial either Picricum acidum Phosphoricum acidum Homaccord pillules , placebo ( unmedicated sucrose pillules ) , randomize dispense UJ Homeopathic Dispenser . Participants request take 5 pillules daily dose 14 day , commence 21 day cease 7 day prior start examination . The State-Trait-Anxiety-Inventory ( STAI ) Anxiety Symptom Score Card complete 21 day prior first academic examination , well last day take medication . Data collect analyzed Statkon , use Shapiro-Wilk test , Mann-Whitney test Wilcoxon sign rank test . The outcome research may show Homeopathic Picricum acidum Phosphoricum acidum Homaccord positive effect alleviate anxiety university student , allow study field .
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 18 45 ; Registered University student ; Participants must experience anxiety symptom , manifest six follow criterion : muscle tension , increased perspiration , rapid heartbeat , headache , stomach ache , agitation , irritability , hostility , fear , extreme sensitivity rejection failure , motor restlessness , procrastination , excessive worry , concentration difficulty , attention difficulty memory problem ; Participants must write major examination one week study end ; Participants must six symptom relate Picricum acidum Phosphoricum acidum ( Appendix D ) ; Participants must cell phone online computer access . â€¢ Have diagnose : A psychological anxiety disorder , Psychiatric disorder ( Bipolar disorder , Depression ) , Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder Epilepsy .
